name: The Trivia Quiz
description:
Welcome to the trivia game! The rules are simple. Click an option and move onto the next question.  Then, at the end, see your final score to see how well your knowledge is! Also, shown below is the category for each question.

Questions 1 & 2: Math

Questions 3 & 4: Geography

Question 5: Science

Question 6: History & Politics

Question 7: Sports

Question 8: Grammar

Questions 9 & 10: Food

Now go ahead and play and see how many you can get correct!
